head: element
Description
rows: The element at the root of the XML document. Table 224 lists the required attributes for this element.
Encloses text that is interpreted as a paragraph. It may take the style attributes listed in Table 225.
Encloses text that is displayed in an italic font.
Encloses text that is displayed in a bold font.
Groups text solely for the purpose of applying styles (using the attributes in Table 225).
